page.title: 18HOME LIFE MY FAMILY
page.content: I am an 11 year boy old boy living in Gilwern.I am one of a family of 6.I have a mum and a dad,2 sisters and 1 brother.My father's name is James,my mum's is Christine,my brother's is Stewart and my 2 sisters are Amanda and Keri.My mum works at Nantyglo Comprehensive as a maths teacher.My dad is the pharmacist in the chemist in Gilwern.All the children go to Gilwern C.P. School.My mum hasn't really got a hobby as she has to do a lot of marking.My dad enjoys brewing and jogging.I enjoy reading and any kind of sport.My sister,Amanda,enjoys ballet.My other brother and sister don't really have any hobbies.
